shows.title: Big Little Lies
shows.fact: Nicole Kidman was once engaged to Lenny Kravitz.
shows.description: Based on the book by Liane Moriarty, this dark comedic drama that weaves a tale of murder and mischief as it explores society’s myth of perfection.

shows.title: Lucky Louie
shows.fact: Lucky Louie was filmed before a live studio audience.
shows.description: Developed by Louis C.K., a sitcom that tells the story of a blue-collar couple raising their young daughter

shows.title: Silicon Valley
shows.fact: There are fan-made websites for calculating a Weissman Score.
shows.description: In the high-tech gold rush of modern Silicon Valley, the people most qualified to succeed are the least capable of handling success.

shows.title: West World
shows.fact: The budget for the first series was around $100 million.
shows.description: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, it explores a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged.

shows.title: True Blood
shows.fact: The opening sequence won an Emmy in 2009 for Outstanding Main Title Design.
shows.description: Thanks to a Japanese scientist's invention of synthetic blood, vampires have progressed from legendary monsters to fellow citizens overnight.

shows.title: The Larry Sanders Show
shows.fact: The Hey Now episode was actually the first episode written and produced.
shows.description: Created by and starring Garry Shandling as a fictional late-night talk-show host.

shows.title: Enlightened
shows.fact: Laura Dern's film debut was a cameo in her mother's film White Lightning.
shows.description: A well-intentioned employee who, after flipping out and going to anger-management rehab, emerges with a mission to make her company more responsible.

shows.title: Six Feet Under
shows.fact: The opening sequence was shot in Seattle.
shows.description: The cathartic journey of the Fisher family, whose personal trials and tribulations are played out against the reflective backdrop of an independent funeral home in LA.

shows.title: Grey Gardens
shows.fact: Little Edie had a night club cabaret show after the movie.
shows.description: Using the original documentary as the film's framework, the film focuses on their glamorous and well-heeled lives long before the making of the documentary.

shows.title: The Sopranos
shows.fact: Livia Soprano was supposed to die in season 1.
shows.description: The series portrays the difficulties Tony Soprano faces as he tries to balance the conflicting requirements of his home life and his criminal organization.

shows.title: The Wire
shows.fact: Barack Obama has cited it as his favorite show.
shows.description: Baltimore drug scene, seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

shows.title: Behind The Candelabra
shows.fact: Mr. Showmanship learned to play piano by ear by the age of 4.
shows.description: A chronicle of the tempestuous six year romance between megastar singer, Liberace, and his young lover, Scott Thorson.

shows.title: Veep
shows.fact: Armando Iannucci purposely didn't watch other American political shows when he developed Veep.
shows.description: Former Senator Selina Meyer finds that being Vice President of the United States is nothing like she hoped and everything that everyone ever warned her about.

shows.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
shows.fact: Each episode is based on an outline and no dialogue is ever written.
shows.description: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself in with his friends and complete strangers.

shows.title: Insecure
shows.fact: Issa Rae created the Web series 'The Misadventures of Awkward Black Girl'.
shows.description: Follows the awkward experiences and tribulations of a modern-day African-American woman.

shows.title: High Maintenance
shows.fact: Nineteen episodes were made before partnering with HBO.
shows.description: A comedy that explores the private lives of unique New York individuals through a common thread: their weed deliveryman.

shows.title: Bored To Death
shows.fact: There has been talk about it becoming a movie.
shows.description: A well-meaning but struggling writer decides to lead a sort of double life by pretending to be a private detective using the methods he read about in old detective novels.

shows.title: Girls
shows.fact: Girls is one of HBO's highest-rated series.
shows.description: A comedy about the experiences of a group of girls in their early 20s.

shows.title: The Leftovers
shows.fact: No religious or scientific meaning exists for the disappearance.
shows.description: Three years after the disappearance of 2% of the global population, a group of people from New York struggle to continue their lives, while they cope with the tragedy of the unexplained nature of the event.

shows.title: Not Necessarily The News
shows.fact: It was Conan O'brien's first professional television writing gig.
shows.description: An offbeat look at current events, often by dubbing over news video with farcical commentary.

shows.title: Game Of Thrones
shows.fact: There's an unaired pilot.
shows.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while a forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.
